MR No. 1369 - Unity in the Home and in the Church

              (Written June 24, 1903, at Sanitarium, California.) 

     Let those who have heard the truth for these last days study carefully the fourth chapter of Deuteronomy, and take heed to the warnings contained therein. Many who have heard the truth treat it as a garment, which they may put on at certain times, and lay off again at will.
